text: Lasse Nilsen (born 21 February 1995) is a Norwegian football defender who currently plays for Tromsdalen UIL on loan from Norwegian Premier League side Tromsø. He hails from Bleik and started his youth career in Høken, moving on to Andenes around his early teens. He then went to the regional great team Tromsø IL, with whom he signed a professional contract in April 2014. He plays as a left back or winger. He made his first team debut in the 2014 Norwegian First Division, which ended with Tromsø being promoted, and made his first- tier debut in May 2015 against Odd. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="8" |Tromsø |2014 |rowspan="1" |1. divisjon |13||0||3||0||4||0||20||0 |- |2015 |rowspan="2" |Tippeligaen |11||0||2||0||colspan="2"|-||13||0 |- |2016 |11||0||1||0||colspan="2"|-||12||0 |- |2017 |rowspan="3" |Eliteserien |12||0||1||0||colspan="2"|-||13||0 |- |2018 |26||3||2||0||colspan="2"|-||28||3 |- |2019 |23||1||3||1||colspan="2"|-||26||2 |- |2020 |rowspan="1" |OBOS-ligaen |13||1||0||0||colspan="2"|-||13||1 |- !colspan="2"|Total !109!!5!!12!!1!!4!!0!!125!!6 |- |rowspan="2" |Tromsdalen (loan) |2017 |rowspan="1" |OBOS-ligaen |15||1||0||0||colspan="2"|-||15||1 |- !colspan="2"|Total !15!!1!!0!!0!!-!!-!!15!!1 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !124!!6!!12!!1!!4!!0!!140!!7 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:People from Andøy Category:Norwegian footballers Category:Tromsø IL players Category:Tromsdalen UIL players Category:Norwegian First Division players Category:Eliteserien players Category:Association football defenders
